packempresa.text1: We have different packages for enterprises, see them below.
packempresa.text2: Enjoy a different day with exciting activities and good food.
packempresa.explicacio: In the case of groups over 16, this will be divided because the activity is maximum 16 people. So while some people going for a Segway tour or Hiking, the others can play Paintball or vice versa. In other cases, a small group of 6 people can change Paintball for Room Escape.

avis.acreditar: * The company will have to certify that the group comes from it.
avis.grupgran: * In case of larger groups of 24, will be charged 5 euros/person for logistics and personnel.
